professional_summary: Mechanical and Aerospace Engineer with multidisciplinary expertise in structural design, thermal systems, and automation. Over 2 years of experience in design, analysis, and establishment of advanced manufacturing systems for defense-grade lithium batteries. Skilled in translating complex requirements into manufacturable designs, leading cross-functional projects, and implementing IoT-based process automation to meet stringent reliability and quality standards.

education.institution: Malla Reddy College of Engineering and Technology

experience.organization: Renewable Energy Systems Limited – Aerospace & Defense Thermal Battery Division
responsibilities: Design and Developed jigs, fixtures, and mechanical components for lithium thermal batteries manufacturing and various environmental test setups
Develop CAD models, perform tolerance stack-up and FEA analysis for high-temperature structural components
Lead automation and IoT integration projects for glovebox and process systems to improve manufacturability
impact: Enhanced production reliability by implementing process automation and structural redesigns
Delivered design documentation and qualification data for aerospace certification (AS9100 standards)
Designed and Developed glovebox and argon circulation systems improving safety and efficiency in battery assembly
Trained in manufacturing processes and quality control for steam turbine production
Assisted in the design and analysis of turbine components using CAD and FEA tools
Managed operational planning and logistics for social impact programs involving 500+ beneficiaries
Established efficient data and reporting systems improving transparency and execution speed

projects.title: Aerospace Component Design & Validation Framework
projects.description: Developed and tested structural components under simulated aerospace thermal and mechanical loads to validate FEA/CFD.

projects.title: Lithium Thermal Battery Manufacturing Line
projects.description: Designed and established end-to-end lithium thermal battery production line incorporating gloveboxes, argon circulation, and automated control systems.
impact: Enabled in-house R&D to production transition

projects.title: Robotic Arm and Assembly Guidance System
projects.description: Developed IoT-based LED guidance and robotic sequencing system for precision assembly of thermal battery components.

projects.title: Hydrogen Fuel Cell Prototype
projects.description: Academic project involving design and development of a hydrogen fuel cell for automotive applications.

achievements: Executed aerospace-grade mechanical design and validation of thermal battery assemblies
Set up end-to-end lithium battery manufacturing system meeting defense standards
Implemented IoT-enabled automation to improve design-to-production traceability
Delivered verified CFD/FEA simulation data for component optimization
